synopsis.text: In 1986 Japan, Ryo Hazuki's quiet life is shattered when a mysterious Chinese man and his thugs invade the Hazuki family home, confronting Ryo's father, Iwao. The Chinese man demands to know the location of a mirror, and when Iwao refuses to reveal it, a fateful battle ensues. Iwao attempts to fight off his attacker but is outmatched by the man's superior fighting prowess. Ryo tries to intervene but is knocked down, forced to watch helplessly as his father is defeated and murdered. With his dying breath, Iwao utters the name "Di Lan," referring to the Chinese man whose back bears an emblem of a glittering dragon. After stealing the mysterious mirror, Di Lan and his thugs disappear, leaving Ryo devastated. Fueled by grief and rage, Ryo vows revenge against Di Lan. To locate the killer and understand the secrets behind the stolen mirror, Ryo must unravel a complex mystery tied to his father's hidden past. His journey of justice and truth will lead Ryo out of his quiet home life and into a dangerous new world.
